sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均含"趋势，倾向"之意。
means: trend ： 指事物发展总的方向、倾向或趋势。
tendency ： 指固有或习得的倾向性，强调没有外来的影响或干扰。
current ： 指向某一方面发展或在趋向中行动。

sentence.Network_en: Stewart has developed a tendency to mix it verbally with the opposition.
sentence.Network_cn: 斯图尔特现在变得只要和别人意见不合，就准备大吵一架。

sentence.Network_en: They have a tendency to try to sidetrack you from your task.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们总试图让你从你的任务中分心。

sentence.Network_en: They have a tendency to show off, to dramatize almost every situation.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们爱炫耀，几乎对每种情况都添油加醋。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 医学英语教程_百度文库 ... difficiency 不足，不全 tendency 趋势，趋向 frequency 频率.
英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... tendence n 趋势，趋向 tendency n 倾向 contend v 竞争，争论.
医学英语教程_百度文库 ... difficiency 不足，不全 tendency 趋势，趋向 frequency 频率.
高考阅读高频单词_百度文库 ... tend vi. 易于,趋向 88. tendency n. 趋向,趋势 89. ultimate a. 极端的,最大的,最终的.

list.abs: trend 和tendency的区别？_百度知道 ... tendency to sth 趋向；趋于 unhealthy tendency 不正之风 natural tendency 自然趋势.
...由频数表可看出频数分布的两个重要特征：集中趋势（central tendency）和离散程度(dispersion)。身高有高有矮，但多数人身高集中在中间部分组段，以中等身高居多，此.
[51]这是一种“趋势分析(tendency analysis)”模式，意指在政治结构的不同层次上，决策过程中不同价值观相互协调的过程。刘易斯和 …
CHINESE-ENGLISH DICTIONARY FOR BASIC MEDICINE ... 出血 hemorrhage 出血倾向 bleeding tendency 出血时间 bleeding time.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent.: from medieval Latin tendentia, from tendere 'to stretch' (see tend)

entry.tran: (令人焦虑或不快的)习惯，经常性行为，倾向
entry.def: A tendency is a worrying or unpleasant habit or action that keeps occurring.

example.ex: The army has become increasingly restless over the mounting separatist tendencies of the northern republics.
example.tran: 军方对于北方几个共和国不断加剧的分裂倾向感到越来越不安。

example.ex: ...the government's tendency towards secrecy in recent years.
example.tran: 近年来政府的保密倾向

entry.def: A tendency is a part of your character that makes you behave in an unpleasant or worrying way.

example.ex: He is spoiled, arrogant and has a tendency towards snobbery...
example.tran: 他被宠坏了，傲慢无礼，而且经常自命不凡。

example.ex: Helen had been struggling against suicidal tendencies.
example.tran: 海伦一直在压制心里的自杀念头。

means.word_mean: 1. an attitude of mind especially one that favors one alternative over others;

sentences.sentence: "he had an inclination to give up too easily"

means.word_mean: 3. a characteristic likelihood of or natural disposition toward a certain condition or character or effect;

sentences.sentence: "the alkaline inclination of the local waters"

means.word_mean: 4. a general direction in which something tends to move;

auth_sentence.content: His compulsive tendency to act in a feminine way.
auth_sentence.res_content: His compulsive tendency to act in a feminine way.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: His compulsive tendency to act in a feminine way.

auth_sentence.content: This tendency you can see all over the world.
auth_sentence.res_content: This tendency you can see all over the world.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This tendency you can see all over the world.

auth_sentence.content: Perhaps nowadays there is a tendency to over-think things.
auth_sentence.res_content: Perhaps nowadays there is a tendency to over-think things.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Perhaps nowadays there is a tendency to over-think things.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 有意的, 故意的, 已经订婚的
stems_affixes.word_buile: intend[v.想要,打算,企图]+ed……的→adj.有意的, 故意的, 已经订婚的 n.已经订婚者
intend[[v.想要,打算,企图]]拿省鷄dj.目不转睛的,热切的 n.意图

stems_affixes.value_cn: 嫩的, 温柔的, 软弱的
stems_affixes.word_buile: tend伸展,趋向+er→像伸出的幼芽→嫩的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 出席, 出席的人数, 伺候, 照料
stems_affixes.word_buile: attend[v.出席,参加]+ance表名词→n.出席, 出席的人数, 伺候, 照料
attend[v.出席,参加]+ant人→n.服务员;随从,随员
intend[v.想要,打算,企图]+ed……的→adj.有意的, 故意的, 已经订婚的 n.已经订婚者
intend[[v.想要,打算,企图]]拿省鷄dj.目不转睛的,热切的 n.意图
tend趋向+ency表名词→n.趋势,趋向;倾向
at加强+tend伸展,趋向→伸出去→出席
con一起+tend伸展,趋向→一起伸展→竞争,斗争

stems_affixes.value_cn: 延长,延伸;扩充;给予;提供;估价
stems_affixes.word_buile: ex出+tend伸展,趋向→伸出去→扩张
in内+tend伸展,趋向→内心伸出→想要

stems_affixes.value_cn: 假装,假托,借口,[在演戏中]装扮
stems_affixes.word_buile: pre预先,提前+tend伸展,趋向→提前展开,事先展开→假装,借口
pro前+tend伸展,趋向→v.[使]伸出, [使]伸展

stems_affixes.value_cn: 趋向,往往是;易于,往往会;照料,看护
stems_affixes.word_buile: tend伸展,趋向→趋向做→易于,往往会

Sentence.sentence: Private markets for goods, services, labor, and securities do mostly self-correct, but panic feeds on itself and disarms these stabilizing tendencies.
Not only does she have a tendency to be moody all the time, but she misses appointments, doesn't follow through on projects, and doesn't seem to plan anything till the last minute.

sentences.en: He has a tendency to forget things.
Prices continue to show an upward tendency.
sentences.cn: 物价呈继续上升的趋势。

jushi.english: He has a tendency to forget things.
There is a tendency to use plastics in place of metals at present.
jushi.chinese: 目前出现了用塑料代替金属的倾向。

jushi.english: Matters have taken a new tendency to〔towards〕 peace.
jushi.chinese: 事态有了向和平方向发展的新趋势。
